content.text:
# Analysis of Main Target Image

## Count & Layers
The structure consists of two connected parts with a total of 17 blocks arranged in multiple layers:
- Left section: 8 orange cylindrical pillars with 4 green rectangular blocks on top
- Right section: A portal-like structure with 2 green vertical blocks and 3 yellow horizontal blocks

## Spatial Relationships
1. Left Section:
   - 8 orange cylindrical pillars arranged in 2 rows of 4 (bottom layer)
   - 4 green rectangular blocks placed horizontally on top of the cylinders (top layer)

2. Right Section:
   - 2 yellow horizontal blocks at the bottom (base layer)
   - 2 green vertical blocks standing on the bottom yellow blocks (middle layer)
   - 1 yellow horizontal block connecting the tops of the green vertical blocks (top layer)

# Required Blocks from Dictionary

Based on the analysis, I need:
- Block #13 (orange vertical cylinder) x8
- Block #2 (green horizontal rectangular block) x4
- Block #3 (green vertical rectangular block) x2
- Block #7 (yellow horizontal rectangular block) x3

# Assembly Order

```
{
   Step1: Move block with index 7
   Step2: Move block with index 7
   Step3: Move block with index 13
   Step4: Move block with index 13
   Step5: Move block with index 13
   Step6: Move block with index 13
   Step7: Move block with index 13
   Step8: Move block with index 13
   Step9: Move block with index 13
   Step10: Move block with index 13
   Step11: Move block with index 2
   Step12: Move block with index 2
   Step13: Move block with index 2
   Step14: Move block with index 2
   Step15: Move block with index 3
   Step16: Move block with index 3
   Step17: Move block with index 7
}
```
